description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Avatar Panic rejuvenates an Arcade classic, now in Full HD! Pop bubbles with your harpoon while avoiding being hit by them! Includes an Arcade mode with 50 levels, and Panic mode for fast-paced games! Play alone or cooperatively with your friends and try to achieve #1 world ranking!
description.short: Avatar Panic rejuvenates an Arcade classic, now in Full HD! Pop bubbles with your harpoon while avoiding being hit by them! Includes an Arcade mode with 50 levels, and Panic mode for fast-paced games! Play alone or cooperatively with your friends and try to achieve #1 world ranking!
